design_strategy.visual_style: Minimalist SaaS, High-Legibility, Data-Dense but Breathable

colors.gradients: NONE. Use flat colors and subtle borders only.

layout_grid.sidebar_nav: w-64 flex-shrink-0 border-r border-slate-200 bg-white hidden md:flex flex-col
layout_grid.chat_panel: w-96 flex-shrink-0 border-l border-slate-200 bg-white flex flex-col h-full shadow-sm

job_card.wrapper: group relative flex flex-col p-6 bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl hover:shadow-md hover:border-indigo-200 transition-all duration-200 cursor-pointer
job_card.title: text-lg font-semibold text-slate-900 group-hover:text-indigo-600 transition-colors
job_card.meta: flex items-center gap-4 mt-4 text-sm text-slate-500
job_card.badge: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-slate-100 text-slate-800

pipeline_stepper.container: flex items-center w-full mb-8 border-b border-slate-200 pb-6
pipeline_stepper.step_active: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-indigo-50 text-indigo-700 rounded-full text-sm font-semibold ring-1 ring-indigo-200
pipeline_stepper.step_inactive: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 text-slate-500 text-sm font-medium hover:text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-full transition-colors

candidate_card.wrapper: flex items-start gap-4 p-4 bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-lg hover:border-indigo-100 hover:shadow-sm transition-all
candidate_card.avatar: h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-slate-100 flex items-center justify-center text-slate-600 font-bold text-sm
candidate_card.name: text-sm font-medium text-slate-900 truncate

tabs.list: inline-flex h-10 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-slate-100 p-1 text-slate-500 w-full justify-start mb-6
tabs.trigger: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-all focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=active]:bg-white data-[state=active]:text-slate-900 data-[state=active]:shadow-sm

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns/modals. No heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid slate-200 everywhere. Rounded-lg or rounded-xl.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down 0.98 on click. Links underline or color shift on hover.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use clean SVG icons or simple typography for empty states. No complex illustrations.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT THE LAYOUT FIRST: Create the 'DashboardLayout' component with the left sidebar, main content area, and the PERSISTENT right chat panel.

2. CHAT PANEL: This is a critical feature. It must be visible on all Sourcing tabs. It should feel like a 'Co-pilot'. Use a different background color (white) vs the main content (slate-50) to separate contexts.
3. JOB DETAILS: The Pipeline View is the hero. Make it clear which stage is active. When 'Sourcing' is active, render the Sub-workflow tabs below it.
4. SOURCING TABS: 'Talent Match', 'Syndication', 'Auto Sourcing', 'Consolidated'. Each tab content should list candidates.

5. CANDIDATE CARDS: Strictly text/initials only. Use `Avatar` component from Shadcn with `AvatarFallback` showing 2 initials. Randomize background colors of avatars for visual variety (bg-red-100, bg-blue-100, etc).
6. DUMMY DATA: Create a robust `mockData.js` file with 5 jobs and ~10 candidates per sourcing channel. Use the provided image URLs for company logos.
7. NAVIGATION: Clicking a Job Card > Goes to Job Details > Default to 'Sourcing' stage active.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetrical grids.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical (p-6, p-8).
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
